targets.rawSql:
select hx.ABSTICH_ID, hx.EA_Q,
         cao.WERT/nullif(sio2.WERT, 0.0) as "CA_P1", NULL as "CA_P2"
           from ROG_PRODUKTION.ROG_VS5_ABSTICH_LAST10 hx
                left join
                (
                  select p1.ABSTICH_ID, b.WERT
                    from ROG_PRODUKTION.ROG_HX_ABSTICH_PROBE p1
                         inner join ROG_PRODUKTION.ROG_HX_ABSTICH_PROBE_ANALYSE b
                         on p1.PROBE_ID = b.PROBE_ID
                   where p1.PROBE_Q = 1
                     and p1.PROBEGRUPPE_ID =   3
                     and p1.BEWERTUNG_ID   =   1
                     and p1.LABOR_ID       = 100
                     and  b.EIGENSCHAFT_ID = 121
                ) cao
                on cao.ABSTICH_ID = hx.ABSTICH_ID
                left join
                (
                  select p1.ABSTICH_ID, b.WERT
                    from ROG_PRODUKTION.ROG_HX_ABSTICH_PROBE p1
                         inner join ROG_PRODUKTION.ROG_HX_ABSTICH_PROBE_ANALYSE b
                         on p1.PROBE_ID = b.PROBE_ID
                   where p1.PROBE_Q = 1
                     and p1.PROBEGRUPPE_ID =   3
                     and p1.BEWERTUNG_ID   =   1
                     and p1.LABOR_ID       = 100
                     and  b.EIGENSCHAFT_ID = 269
                ) sio2
                on sio2.ABSTICH_ID = hx.ABSTICH_ID
   order by hx.EA_Q
